name: CLINT IS NOT AN INCEL: A WORD ON FATNESS AND MASCULINITY
name_original: CLINT IS NOT AN INCEL: A WORD ON FATNESS AND MASCULINITY
description:
Use the arrow keys to play/read.

I wrote this for the Bitsy Essay Jam. I'd been meaning to write something up about these feelings, and i'd been meaning to make a bitsy, so the timing of the jam was perfect.
